text: The UEFA European Under-18 Championship 1957 Final Tournament was held in Spain. ==Teams== The following teams entered the tournament: * * * * * * * * * * * * * * (host) * ==Group stage== ===Group A=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 1 1 0 3 1 +2 3 2 1 1 0 3 2 +1 3 2 0 0 2 1 4 –3 0 14 April 2–0 16 April 2–1 19 April 1–1 ===Group B=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 2 1 0 13 2 +11 5 3 0 3 0 5 5 0 3 3 1 1 1 4 6 –2 3 3 0 1 2 3 12 –9 1 14 April 2–2 4–0 16 April 2–2 8–1 19 April 1–1 2–0 ===Group C=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 3 0 0 11 1 +10 6 3 2 0 1 8 8 0 4 3 1 0 2 5 10 –5 2 3 0 0 3 3 8 –5 0 14 April 2–1 3–0 16 April 3–0 5–2 19 April 3–2 5–1 ===Group D=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 2 0 1 7 4 +3 4 3 2 0 1 6 4 +2 4 3 2 0 1 4 3 +1 4 3 0 0 3 1 7 –6 0 14 April 3–1 2–1 16 April 2–0 3–2 19 April 2–0 2–0 ==Semifinals== ==Third place match== ==Final== ==Other websites== *Results by RSSSF Category:UEFA European Under-19 Championship Category:1957 in Europe Category:1957 in sports
